title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.90 - Endowment fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.90 - Endowment fund

State Regulations

Funds, usually of a nonprofit institution, in which a
donor has stipulated, as a condition of gift, that the principal of the fund is
to be maintained inviolate and in perpetuity and that only income from
investments of the fund may be expended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.90

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
